posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: Equality4All
posts.text: Raising the minimum wage to a living wage, implementing wealth taxation, and eradicating poverty are not just policy proposals, they are moral imperatives for a just society that we must enact now. We must demand economic justice!
